info.author: Leandro Melo de Sales (leandroal)
info.description:
BRisa is an UPnP framework written in Python. It provides facilities for
creating UPnP devices and control points. It's API comprehends internet
messaging protocols and services (UDP, HTTP, SOAP), network utilitaries,
threading management, main loop, logging, configurations, webserver and more.
info.name: python-brisa
info.html_description: BRisa is an UPnP framework written in Python. It provides facilities for creating UPnP devices and control points. It’s API comprehends internet messaging protocols and services (UDP, HTTP, SOAP), network utilitaries, threading management, main loop, logging, configurations, webserver and more.
